data.eml:eml: Three new species of Claudiella Reichardt & Vanin, 1976 (Coleoptera, Torridincolidae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Benetti, Cesar João, Hamada, Neusa (2016): Three new species of Claudiella Reichardt & Vanin, 1976 (Coleoptera, Torridincolidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 4205 (2): 151-161, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4205.2.4
